Total Cost of Revenue: cost of coal products and services
cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): gain loss on sale of equity investments
gains losses on extinguishment of debt

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer before reimbursements excluding assessed tax
revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax
revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax reimbursements

__unmapped__: change in estimated acquisition earnout payables
common stock dividends per share declared
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation before income tax
discontinued operation tax effect of discontinued operation
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
